channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 04:41 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 04:41 Air alert in Kharkiv region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
